Photo: @grickotattoo, @lakeedentattoo on Instagram (modified by author) https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/2909d69fdb54079d.png Nature tattoos allow you to showcase your love for the wild. Evacuations have been ordered in oil-producing Fort McMurray, Alberta on May 14. Authorities have been bracing for another possibly devastating wildfire season, after Canada's worst ever last year that saw flames burning from coast to coast and charring more than 15 million hectares (37 million acres) of land.. Photo: pexels.com, @introspectivedsgn (modified by author) https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/4744869b9a152feb.jpg Check engine light means that there is a major problem that should be checked. Photo: @checkengine_light on Instagram (modified by author) https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/5b1f81657c72cdfa.jpg The battery warning light is an alert to check the car battery. @landonauto on Instagram (modified by author) https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/6b657eda94eda611.jpg A coolant temperature warning light pops up when the coolant overheats. Photo: @YoutubeRakeshDrivingTricks on Facebook (modified by author) https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/819bc99b87e6c1be.jpg Traction control light helps the driver navigate slippery roads. pexels.com, @introspectivedsgn https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/f6befa13c87c364f.jpg The oil pressure warning light indicates that oil levels are not optimal. Photo: @martin.nyathi.75 on Facebook (modified by author) https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/026842b511d44256.jpg The tyre pressure monitoring system warning light goes on when the tyres have pressure issues or are damaged. Photo: mashabuba, Jacky Parker Photography, Feifei Cui-Paoluzzo (modified by author) https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/5d49176903083736.jpg Amaryllis is a small genus of flowering bulbs with two species. Photo: wulingyun https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/9955b36d1dbdb8d1.jpg Alyssums are known to mean worth beyond beauty, making them a popular choice in many floral arrangements. Photo: DEA / A.MORESCHI https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/3fc062117fbca34f.jpg Originally from Asia and North America, these flowering symbolise taking care of yourself and those around you. Photo: ooyoo https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/29aa0672cc713e00.jpg Achillea millefolium or yarrow is a flowering plant in the family Asteraceae, native to the Northern Hemisphere. Photo: ChristopherBernard https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/db4b3a89894ca77a.jpg Allium is a genus of monocotyledonous flowering plants with hundreds of species, including cultivated onion, garlic, scallion, shallot, leek, and chives. Photo: AlpamayoPhoto https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/bfc0d125c14eb11e.jpg Anemones, also known as windflowers, are engaging herbaceous perennials that are low-growing plants with vibrant blooms. Photo: love Photo and Apple. https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/9726562c94c5f514.jpg Asters are notable for their starburst arrangement of bright petals, which most often surround a yellow centre. Photo: stockcam https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/59f52ae24b9db0de.jpg Agapanthus is a genus of flowering plants that captivate with their large clusters of showy blue or white flowers. Photo: Photo by Alex Tihonov https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/1b6cb6d62a51c13a.jpg Angel’s Trumpet is known for its huge, pendulous trumpet-shaped blooms and irresistible fragrance. Photo: Luis Diaz Devesa https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/9c8007784eff1d6f.jpg Aconite flowers are renowned for its striking blue, purple, or white flowers. Photo: Feifei Cui-Paoluzzo https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/5f48fce6a29acd4d.jpg African Daisy is an annual flower known for its bright colours and long blooming period. Photo: Henrik Karlsson https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/cd33c3c55bdcdb81.jpg Ageratum flowers are native to Central and South America. Photo: nilapictures https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/5620b9e62df03366.jpg Angelonia flowers bloom from late spring through fall and add cheerful colour to containers, borders, or garden beds. Photo: KoBoZaa https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/88ee4a72878e499c.jpg Asphodel flowers produce tall spikes covered with white star-shaped flowers in spring. Photo: membio https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/13759fc367ad5284.jpg Alamanda flowers are often associated with positivity and warmth. Photo: NancyAyumi https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/e7213723e852bb88.jpg African violets are known for their velvety leaves and purple, white, pink or blue flowers. Photo: Pilat666 https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/9da8516524a462f2.jpg Anthuriums are native to South America and make great houseplants and outdoor decor in warm weather. Photo: Andrey Bukreev https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/6eb3e4e46d9d03e6.jpg Aquilegia flowers are native to meadows and woodlands across the Northern Hemisphere, especially in temperate climates. Photo: kjschoen https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/3305758594892242.jpg Alstroemeria symbolises friendship, love, strength, and devotion. Photo: magicflute002 https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/7ff66f377c2c6b85.jpg Astilbe is a genus of flowering plants that are renowned for their feathery, plume-like flowers and their ability to thrive in shade gardens. Photo: LordRunar https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/916b1cb5ee46014c.jpg Arum lily perennials are native to southern Africa and are often associated with purity and beauty. Photo: aimintang https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/c2fa7088b61072be.jpg Aubrieta is a low-growing, evergreen perennial that forms a mat of flowers. Photo: seven75 https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/a8054e41732d2343.jpg In mythology, bellflowers have long been associated with witches and fairies and used in charms to bring luck and compel truth. Photo: RukiMedia https://netstorage-legit.akamaized.net/images/96e3e4888feaea79.jpg Acanthus flowers are well-known for their stylised leaves, which have been used in architectural decorations for millennia.
